title: Medium Energy Particle experiments - electron analyzer (MEP-e) electron omni flux data, ARASE/ERG - Satoshi Kasahara (The University of Tokyo)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/erg/mepe/l2/omniflux/2017/erg_mepe_l2_omniflux_20170323_v01_02.cdf. The most common cadence, 7984470016 [ns] = PT7.98447S, occurred for 21.5601% of the 2120 timesteps.
info.contact: Satoshi Kasahara @ The University of Tokyo

parameters.name: FEDO_T
parameters.description: ---> FEDO as stacked time series. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['FEDO']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
